Scanner - Class in robot
Scanner takes care of the Light Value for the bearings and Ultrasonic value, or the Echo Distance to the wall or objects.

ScanRecorder - Class in milestone2
records the results of a 180 degree scan (angle and light intensity to a dataLogger and plays it back over a USB port
